Text:
I don't know WHY anyone would seed this but get it at the author's site because it is freeware:  http://bruneras.com/
http://download.theforce.net/games/starwars_thebattleofendor_v21.exe

You can also get Battle of Yavin plus the Graphics/Sound upgrade created by TMaster_Syrus
from your yellow "here" link under it.

I use the Battle of Endor with the graphics upgrade installed to test laptops for speed and performance. A dual core machine runs this game very fast, a single core under 1.5GHz will be noticeably  slower, so it serves a purpose besides being a game. It will reveal hardware driver issues instantly.
Also, my top score in it was 497, anybody hot 500?
